topic.title: Connect Yeastar TA Gateway
topic.shortdesc: Follow the steps to connect Yeastar TA400/800 FXS VoIP gateway.

li.b: Connect TA gateway to the Internet
li.p: LAN port can be connected to router or PBX.

li.b: Connect TA gateway to analog phones
